marytts.tools.emospeak
Class AsynchronousThreadedMaryClient

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      marytts.tools.emospeak.AsynchronousThreadedMaryClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class AsynchronousThreadedMaryClient
extends java.lang.Thread

A MaryClient that runs in a thread of its own. Requests for synthesis are scheduled through scheduleRequest(), which is not synchronized. Only the last unprocessed request is remembered.

Author:
Marc Schröder

Method Detail

scheduleRequest

public void scheduleRequest(java.lang.String prosodyxmlString,
                            MaryClient.Voice voice,
                            int requestNumber)
Schedule the latest request. Any previous, unprocessed requests are deleted.

Parameters:
prosodyxmlString - the maryxml data to be synthesised.
voice - the synthesis voice to use
requestNumber - request number
